## Select Projects

### [Visualization for Data Science in R](https://github.com/amzoss/RVis-DM2019)

A two-day course on Visualization for Data Science in R, offered during [Data Matters](http://datamatters.org/) 2019.

### [Teach Viz By Example](https://github.com/visualizingthefuture/examples-repository)

A space for the data visualization teaching community to find, share, and contribute exemplary data visualizations + visualization-ready datasets.

### [FOLIO analytics](https://github.com/folio-org/folio-analytics)

A repository of reports and other analytics developed for FOLIO and designed to run on the [Library Data Platform](https://github.com/library-data-platform/ldp).

### [Duke Libraries Journal Usage Dashboard](https://github.com/amzoss/journal_dashboard)

R scripts to prepare journal usage data and generate a dashboard.
